mapper.insert: insert into folder (id, name, dir, secret, in_recycled, password, star) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dir,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secret,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inRecycled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{star,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update folder set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dir = #{dir,jdbcType=INTEGER}, secret = #{secret,jdbcType=INTEGER}, in_recycled = #{inRecycled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, star = #{star,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, dir, secret, in_recycled, password, star from folder
